channel.title: Technical Seo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Shopify SEO: A Practical Guide That Actually Works
item.description:
Shopify SEO is often misunderstood. Some claim Shopify is bad for SEO, others insist it is fully optimized out of the box. The reality is more nuanced.

Shopify can rank extremely well in Google, but only if you understand how the platform works, where its constraints are, and which pages actually deserve SEO attention. This guide focuses on practical, experience-based Shopify SEOâ€”not theoretical checklists.

What Shopify SEO Really Is (and Isn’t)

Shopify SEO is not about installing dozens of apps or chasing artificial SEO scores…
